name: handles-public-api
description: A downloadable and containerized decentralized API for Handles
author: Papa Goose <papa.goose@koralabs.io>

scripts.start:forever: chmod +x setup_env.sh && ./setup_env.sh && mkdir -p forever && forever -p ./forever --minUptime 1 start express.js
scripts.copy-swagger: cp docs/swagger.yml src/swagger.yml && cp docs/swagger.yml dist/swagger.yml
scripts.build:production: yarn build && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && yarn install --production
scripts.dev:mainnet: (export NODE_ENV=production; export NETWORK=mainnet; export ENABLE_DATUM_ENDPOINT=true; yarn start:ogmios && nodemon)
scripts.dev:preprod: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=preprod; export ENABLE_DATUM_ENDPOINT=true; yarn start:ogmios && nodemon)
scripts.dev:preview: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=preview; export ENABLE_DATUM_ENDPOINT=true; yarn start:ogmios && nodemon)
